title.label: Everything you want from an escape adventure and more!

content.label: The sheer complexity and magnitude of this game is stunning! And yet, it's not so difficult that you have to scour the web for walkthroughs.  I love that I could put it down for a while and come back to it with fresh eyes without having any difficulty getting back into the flow.  This is the perfect game, quite frankly.  Enigmatic, engaging, and enthralling!

This game was really fun , so many puzzles within puzzles. Great cognitive stimulation!! It was so fun I honestly wish it was longer , I couldn’t place it down and finished it within 3 days 😅😅. Worth the $5 🤗

I mean, I only tell anyone who will listen about this game. In my opinion, it’s the best one going. Genius interface, simple mechanics, absolutely engrossing storyline. The game does an excellent job of testing your brain, making use of all of your senses. It really is the most interactive and engaging game you can find.

Explore the mansion, unveil the mystery, rescue the girl... well maybe not that last part. If you enjoy a good puzzle, an escape room, subtle reference to the occult this game is right up your alley. Absolutely addictive, play at your own pace, fall in love with the world of The Room.

I had so much fun playing this game in the series!! From the first game in the series to this game i was hooked! I couldn’t wait for the next one to come out. Please continue to make these games and challenge us. I cannot imagine what have in store for us with your next game! Thank you for creating such fun!!
Game is difficult but not crazy impossible. Wonderful storyline and fantastic graphics. Worth every penny:)

title.label: Now works on iPhone 12 Pro Max - GREAT game!

content.label: The Room games are among my favorite, and this is no different. The mood, the atmosphere, and above all, the puzzles are fun and challenging. There hasn’t ever been a puzzle gaming franchise better than this. (And the bug for the iPhone 12 has been fixed so you can now see your inventory and all the buttons.) Buy this - best $5 I’ve spent in a long time.

This was my first experience with ‘the room’ series and really a puzzle game in general. It took me 4 hours and 29 minutes to beat over a few months of playing. It was just the right amount of challenging and exciting. There were crazy plot twists and amazing detail and lord put into this. I cannot wait for another one! This is easily my favorite puzzle game I’ve ever played and the BEST mobile game I’ve ever played!
I absolutely love this game! It’s enough of a challenge to be frustrating at times, but you’ll never be bored!

title.label: iPhone 12 Pro - needs a fix but works

content.label: iPhone 12 Pro - load game, let connect to internet. Restart phone, make sure the top of the phone where the camera keystone is on the right. It covers the monocle but you can easily tap it. The question mark and pause are there and accessible. I believe they are working on a fix. If they fix it I’ll give it 5.
I love the game and I have finished it more than six times and every time I enjoy it the same as I did the first time I played it, thank you guys for a great time I lived
It is as good as it gets. Wonderful rendering. Story line could be more involved with game play. Fabulous distraction from being locked down. Hope there is a Room Five!

I first played Room Pocket years ago and was immediately hooked on the quality of graphics, navigation, and challenge. Years later I saw part 2, then again a couple more years part 3. And yet again, years later I came across part 4. Each time gave me instant excitement and I instantly downloaded and immediately played. I don’t get too much free time so I like that this challenges me and can take me a week or two to finish. I like that the option to turn on/off hints as needed (I had to turn them on twice for help). The ending makes reference to finding Abigail who escaped, so I’m hoping that means a new one is coming?? I don’t remember details of the previous game storyline, but I redownloaded them rn because 1.) I would like to see how they connect, and 2.) I wasn’t ready to be done playing. I will say, the ending was disappointingly anticlimactic. After all the challenges and puzzles before, the ending was....boring and felt rushed to be finished. I truly expected the last level to be the most challenging and maybe the one with the most puzzles. The story was sad and I enjoyed reading the letters, but overall, I’m ready for room 5, so bring it.

The Room games are some of the greatest puzzle/mystery stories the App Store has to offer. A great deal of thought and detail obviously goes into these games, and it shows. I can’t wait for the next installment of this series!

This was so much fun! The puzzles, the storyline... It was all woven together so intricately.
My only criticisms:
1. Don’t be so quick with the hints. Let me struggle with the puzzles for a while!
2. There was a glitch at the very end getting the figurines through the portals. It just would not let me turn the gear the figurine was standing on. I fixed it by shutting down the game and re-opening it.  
3. The Garden was too dark. Even with my brightness turned all the way up I found it hard to see. 

Thanks for such a fun time! Looking forward to the next installment!
A great game! Highly addictive and draws you in. Beautiful graphics too.

title.label: First in the series that I played thru to end

content.label: I have purchased others in the Room series, but never finished them.  I think I’ll go back to the beginning.  The only thing negative I can say is that didn’t always understand the story line, but I know it’s me.  I usually don’t pay much attention to the story.
Cannot access inventory on the iPhone 12 Pro, the fix for iPhone XS and XR does not work.
Can’t say enough good things about The Room series, and this one is no exception. Challenging puzzles and incredible graphics. Completely lost in them.... can’t wait for the next one!!!!
I want more! Challenging, Frustratingly Delightful!!!
I got into these game a while back now... I just re-downloaded all of them.. Best part my daughter is getting into them!! Awesome we get to share this!!
It is so fun
Loved how all consuming the game was.  I miss these kind of puzzles.
I’ve played them all and loved them.  Great graphics and ideas.  Not too easy.. it too difficult. This might be the best one yet.  Hope we can see a 5????
After playing the VR version, I took a chance with this flat screen version and it did not disappoint. Brilliant really. Give me more.
One of the best games I’ve ever played, love how creepy it looks and sounds. The graphics are amazing
What a fun and addicting game! I thoroughly enjoyed the story and was amazed by the creativeness and puzzles. The graphics are really exquisite.
Loved every Room. Interesting, holds your attention, great graphics. I’m in awe at the wonder of this game. Can’t wait for the next chance to play.
This is certainly one of the best games of its type, and it even stands out as an extraordinary member of the series.
I have played all The Room Games and love them all. This one went a little quicker, but still fun and challenging. Can’t wait for more.

that was awesome!!!
great job
Running on my iPad Pro 10.5” with iOS 14.1.  Crashes on startup every time.
Took my mind off to a new place for the last 3 days, much needed escape from the election.

The way all of the storylines tie into one another right now is amazing. It’s not extremely detailed, but it has enough to keep you intrigued. I absolutely love it. Also the graphics, can I just say, holy crap the detail on it is insanely good. Honestly if I was playing this as a vr game I probably would forget what was real for a bit. From the main parts to the grains on the wood floor in the decayed rooms it’s so good. Honestly can’t wait to see another game come out. I get so into it I forget everything around and spend hours having fun with no matter how many times I’ve beaten this, it still holds the same difficulty to an extent. Please keep up the amazing work with these games. In my opinion I would say this if the best puzzle game out there at the moment.
Can’t wait for the next one!
Absolutely awesome!

Once I started I couldn’t put it down.
Many twists and turns to keep you guessing.
I like the graphics and the puzzles. Makes me think and is a great distraction.
Such a great game! The puzzles were challenging, when I was stuck the clues were just enough. The art, graphics and design are beautifully executed!!
I loved the ending the game is so fun I wish more people would get this game because it’s awesome I like the scenery the storyline and specially the creepy tentacle endings of the level
Wishing for a new one!
I didn’t want it to end. I appreciated the guiding hints but didn’t always need them. Each of the Rooms have been spooky and interesting. I highly recommend!
If you enjoy a game with a perfect puzzle challenge, not too easy or too difficult. Engaging, fun good story, keep them coming! Awesome game.
This is a must have game. It’s gripping and it follows The Room. It’s a wonderful addition to the game. So much fun to play.
They have done it again. I cannot wait for the next installment.
I actually enjoyed it sure it troubled me with the riddles but it was a wonderful game,I wonder if there will be a new one.

Hi,

I love these games but am a bit sad completely this last one.  I wish Fireproof had 10 more waiting for me.   Highly recommend.  Great graphics...great puzzles.   Great way to pass the time and stimulate the mind

I was in the middle of playing this game and enjoying it when I decided to upgrade to an iPhone 12 Pro. Since the change, the resolution is off and it cuts off the sides of the screen. Otherwise, it was an enjoyable game.
I can’t help but play over and over. Great and beautiful game. I need more!

I’ve been a big fan of real life escape rooms for years now. After playing other “escape room” mobile games this one truly took me by surprise. You really couldn’t ask for more in an escape room game. The level of detail was impeccable in all 4 games and I couldn’t put the game down until I was done. Hands down this has been my favorite series of mobile games, quite literally, of all time. Looking forward to future releases.

For some strange reason as of the moment I cannot play this game because no matter how many times I reinstall it it can’t get past the screen where it’s trying to sync with iCloud maybe this is just a glitch I have no idea I will continue to try to play this . I do hope that the game is not broken thank you for a great game honestly
